overview: "Opiate" was re-recorded and released as "Opiate2" or "Opiate Squared" on March 1, 2022. It is almost twice as long as the original and includes the same lyrics as the live version, plus the extended instrumental midsection. A music video directed by Jones and Dominic Hailstone was released on March 18 to commemorate the EP's 30th anniversary.
title: TOOL - Opiate²
